A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I literally created an account on Flixster just to rate this movie a 0.5 Star. The amount of plot holes\, cringeworthy moments\, and unfunny attempts at humor makes me feel sorry for die-hard Star Wars fans. Luckily\, I am not one. But as someone that enjoys a good movie despite the genre\, I can tell you this isn’t one.
